name: Mystery Miniaturist
description:
Mystery Miniaturist is a short Disco Elysium-inspired fangame.

Come home to find a dead body in your kitchen. Play detective and have a conversation within your own brain.

1,000 words, fully voiced.

Made for the O2A2 2021 Game Jam, wherein you have a limit of assets and words you can include in your submitted game.

Content warning: Contains the subject of murder and murder investigation. There is no visible blood nor body.

Credits
  • Writing, Character Art, and Programming by Jasmine "Katy133" Osler
  • Voice Acting by Mike Young
  • Music by Orpheo Fenn and Scott Sherman of Faefield Productions
  • Isometric Kitchen Sprites by JP Cummins
  • Floor Tiles by Screaming Brain Studios
  • Cityscape Photo by Mibi Mathew
  • Made in Ren'Py using the GUI Template Disco Framework
